label_config:
<View>
  <Text name="text" value="$text"/>
  <Choices name="claim_label" toName="text">
    <Choice value="SUPPORTED"/>
    <Choice value="REFUTED"/>
    <Choice value="NOT_ENOUGH_INFO"/>
  </Choices>
  <Image name="image" value="$image"/>
  <Choices name="image_label" toName="image">
    <Choice value="real"/>
    <Choice value="fake"/>
  </Choices>
  <Audio name="audio" value="$audio"/>
  <Choices name="audio_label" toName="audio">
    <Choice value="bona_fide"/>
    <Choice value="spoof"/>
  </Choices>
  <Video name="video" value="$video"/>
  <Choices name="video_label" toName="video">
    <Choice value="real"/>
    <Choice value="fake"/>
  </Choices>
</View>
